Implementation approach: We will use a bottom-up approach to calculate the maximum path value of the complete binary tree. We will start by calculating the maximum path value of the leaf nodes. Then, we will calculate the maximum path value of the internal nodes by considering the maximum path values of their left and right children. Finally, we will return the maximum path value of the root node.
Data structures and interfaces:
classDiagram
    class Node {
        -value: int
        -left: Node
        -right: Node
        +__init__(value: int)
        +get_max_path_value() int
    }
Program call flow:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Node
    Node->>Node: __init__(value)
    Node->>Node: get_max_path_value()
